response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. Given its high-quality features and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its worth and the effort put into it, I am extending this opportunity to you for a special introductory price of $150. This offer is exclusive to you and is an excellent chance to experience the quality of our product at a slightly elevated price point compared to what others might pay. I trust that you will find the value proposition compelling. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 150}
